title: Exemption
content:
NJ State Bill 1759 – attempt to limit and then further remove religious exemption from vaccination Ralph Fucetola has... <!--more--> become known as the nation’s “vitamin lawyer” who specializes in Nutrient and Alternative Health Law.
He is widely recognized as the leading attorney in the field for the protection of natural vitamins and supplements and the public’s access to them.
  He was responsible for having DHEA legalized, which has been an over-the-counter supplement helping numerous people.
As a watch dog lawyer, Ralph investigates the big pharmaceutical industry’s attempts to diminish the vitamin industry and change the current legislation permitting Americans freedom to choose their mode of medicine and healthcare.
  He is the Leading Counsel for the Natural Solutions Foundation and has his legal practice in NJ.
For more information visit his website:  www.VitaminLawyer.com TO CONTACT YOUR LEGISLATORS AND OPPOSE BILL, VISIT: http://TinyURL.com/StopForcedVax
